content.en: Microgrid optimization: Researchers have been investigating how to address various challenges in microgrids, such as voltage unbalance, transient line currents, low-voltage ride-through operation, and power sharing. To tackle these issues, they have been using algorithms, specifically consensus algorithms, which enable distributed control and coordination among multiple devices in the microgrid. These algorithms help achieve accurate power sharing, voltage restoration, and reactive power control, ultimately improving the stability and performance of microgrids.
content.da: Mikrogrid-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man kan tackle forskellige udfordringer i mikrogrids, såsom spændingsubalance, transient linjestrømme, lavspændings-gennemgangsoperation og effektfordeling. For at løse disse problemer har de brugt algoritmer, specifikt konsensusalgoritmer, som muliggør distribueret kontrol og koordinering mellem flere enheder i mikrogridden. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at opnå nøjagtig effektfordeling, spændingsgendannelse og reaktiv effektstyring, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer stabiliteten og ydeevnen af mikrogrids.
